data.title: Simple B Main One Way Sky Smoke Hold
data.description: Use this one way smoke to delay, and potentially pick Attackers off effectively.

data.title: Simple Market to B Main Hold
data.description: Use Sky Smoke to cut off B Main visibility, while ensuring any attackers that attempt to push through walk through your Incendiary.

data.title: Early Elbow to A Main One Way
data.description: This one way smoke gives you a chance to cut off attackers early at A Site.
